ygData.subject: Re: faction
ygData.msgSnippet: i dont like it.  if ur +PvP or play on the PvP server, then it should be just that.... PvP. without consequence.  u get enough faction hits from killing the
ygData.messageBody:
i dont like it. if ur +PvP or play on the PvP server, then it should be
just that.... PvP. without consequence. u get enough faction hits from
killing the mobs. i dunno, just my opinion. maybe they should keep the
faction hits for lvls 1-5 to keep the newbies from slaughtering each other,
but at higher lvls, PvP is more organized and subtle.

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 7:22 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] faction


>From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
>
>According to Mike Browne:
>> No it won't. I participated in a Guild war and killed two PCs and
suffered a
>> faction hit. I can no longer purchase items in Felwithe as a result. Bug
>> still exists in program.
>
>It think that Wizard <wizard@...> was saying that faction hits
>outside of an arena, duel or guild war situation would be fine, not
>that they are. Which basically means: faction hits only for PvP players,
>not players that have "temporary" PvP.
>
>As if this would encourage people to switch to PvP :)
>
